title: Homeowners/renters insurance policies
dataVerified: Policyholder name, property address, coverage amounts, deductibles, premium, effective dates
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Policy status (active/cancelled). Link to insurer system (policyholders and mortgage lenders, requires authentication)
rationale: Prevents fake homeowners insurance in mortgage fraud. Domain binding verifies insurer. Mortgage lender verification for forced-place insurance decisions. Prevents coverage inflation. Multi-page declarations and endorsements benefit from per-page verification. Critical for mortgage lending where insurance verification protects lender's collateral.
